description:
On XenServer vhd-util is located in:
* /usr/sbin/vhd-util

But on Kronos it is located in:
* /usr/bin/vhd-util

The XenAPI migration plugin needs to be able to cope with the tool being in either location.
title: in xenapi migration plugin the vhd-util calls fail on kronos

comments.content:
On XenServer vhd-util is located in:
* /usr/sbin/vhd-util

But on Kronos it is located in:
* /usr/bin/vhd-util

The XenAPI migration plugin needs to be able to cope with the tool being in either location.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~johngarbutt

comments.content: This has since been fixed, code inspection says it works in folsom onwards.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~johngarbutt
